main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Willow, Alaska on April 17, 1952, where a bright light was observed climbing to 20,000 feet at an estimated speed of 400 mph.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The object climbed to an estimated altitude of 35,000 feet before descending to 25,000 feet,Subject attempted to follow the object using a searchlight but lost sight of it,No airborne or weather balloons were present in the area during the sighting,The object was described as moving with great speed and maneuverability.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
